Detailed Description

ObitImageInterp class function definitions.

This class is derived from the Obit base class.

ObitImageInterp Class to nterpolate pixel values in images

Function Documentation

ofloat ObitImageInterpValue (  ObitImageInterp *  in,
odouble  RA,
odouble  Dec,
ofloat  Angle,
olong  plane,
ObitErr *  err
) 
 

Public: Get pixel value at a position.

Parameters:
in Object to interpolate
RA Right Ascension desired (deg) @ std. equinox
Dec Declination deg) desired @ std. equinox
Angle (Parallactic) Angle to rotate image (deg)
plane Image plane 0-rel (frequency) to use Can be obtained from ObitImageInterpFindPlane
err Obit error stack object.
Returns:
interpolated beam value - may be fblank

ofloat ObitImageInterpValueInt (  ObitImageInterp *  in,
ObitFInterpolate *  interp,
odouble  RA,
odouble  Dec,
ofloat  Angle,
olong  plane,
ObitErr *  err
) 
 

Public: Get beam value providing interpolator.

Locks in->thread for multithreading Use this routine for best multi-threaded performance and in most useful for interpolating beam images (x=azimuth, y=elevation)

Parameters:
in Object to interpolate
interp Interpolator
RA X or Right Ascension desired (deg) @ std. equinox
Dec Y or Declination deg) desired @ std. equinox
Angle (Parallactic) Angle to rotate (deg)
plane Image plane 0-rel (frequency) to use Can be obtained from ObitImageInterpFindPlane
err Obit error stack object.
Returns:
interpolated beam value - may be fblank
